title: Improve error messages if package merge is blocked
body:
I tried to set up an environment. It did not work.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack env create test
spack env activate test
spack add mpich
spack add hdf5
spack add adios
spack add adios2
spack add python
spack add py-numpy
spack add py-mpi4py
spack add nlohmann-json
spack add mpark-variant
spack install
```

### Error Message

```
==> Concretized mpich
```
